item.title: Solve BYOD consistency issues with VirtualBox
item.description: In my district we are currently planning our 1 to 1 program. We settled on 11.6" laptops running Ubuntu as the device. The problem that has arisen is how to we ensure consistency with students who wish to bring their own laptop. If they were Chromebooks, the BYOD students â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
